name: Asha Verma
bio: specialist in love, marriage, and family issues. known for compassionate and intuitive readings that provide clarity and emotional healing to those facing relationship troubles.

name: Raghav Tiwari
bio: career and business astrologer with a background in psychology and vedic sciences. helps individuals make informed professional choices and navigate corporate life successfully.

name: Soni Pandey
bio: focuses on spiritual guidance, chakra balancing, and mental wellness through astrology. provides calming insights and holistic support for emotional well-being and inner peace.

name: Manoj Kumar Joshi
bio: expert in financial astrology and investment-related predictions. guides clients with strategic planning for wealth management, long-term stability, and smart decision-making.

name: Neha Kapoor
bio: tarot reader and astrologer who helps with decision-making in relationships and daily challenges. offers intuitive forecasts for navigating emotional dilemmas and life paths.

name: Harsh Mehta
bio: guides individuals facing personal confusion or crossroads in life using natal chart readings. known for empathetic consultations that inspire self-discovery and purpose.

name: Divya Sharma
bio: known for child birth-related consultations and fertility astrology using ancient techniques. supports couples with astrological remedies and timelines for family planning.

name: Ankit Desai
bio: helps students and professionals with career path predictions, study success, and exam anxiety. empowers youth with confidence-building insights and future guidance.

name: Ritu Jain
bio: focuses on past-life connections, karmic issues, and soul-purpose discovery through astrology. specializes in deep spiritual readings that unlock inner growth and transformation.

name: Vikram Rathore
bio: experienced in health-related astrology and offering remedies for physical and emotional wellness. creates personalized healing plans rooted in planetary health influences.
